mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.goods_image AS "goodsImage", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.specification AS "specification", a.amount AS "amount", a.price AS "price", a.total_price AS "totalPrice", a.type AS "type", a.status AS "status", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sd_order_info( order_id, goods_id, goods_image, goods_name, specification, amount, price, total_price, type, status, is_deleted, create_time, update_time )VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsName}, #{specification}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{totalPrice}, #{type}, #{status}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sd_order_info SET order_id = #{orderId}, goods_id = #{goodsId}, goods_image = #{goodsImage}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, specification = #{specification}, amount = #{amount}, price = #{price}, total_price = #{totalPrice}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
